title: Multiple Choice Item - Single Select
text: What colour is the sky on a clear day?

title: Multiple Choice Item - Multiple Select
text:
Which of these elements are considered a metal by the Periodic Table?

Please select three options only.

title: Short Response Item (Fill-in-the-blank)
text: What is the sum of £10.00 and £3.00?

meta.longText:
String Input
This input type is designed to accept alphanumeric characters (A–Z, 0–9, punctuation, etc.). Enter your answer below in pounds and pence.

Decimal Input
Enter your answer below as a decimal without the pound (£) sign. Your answer must be to two decimal places.

Integer Input
Enter your answer as a whole number only without the pound (£) sign. Your response must be between 0 and 20.

title: Dropdown Item
text:
In the Philosophiae Naturalis Principia Mathematica (Latin for "Mathematical Principles of Natural Philosophy"), Isaac Newton laid out his laws of motion.

What did this document form the foundations of?

title: True / False
text: An object at rest will stay at rest unless an unbalanced force acts upon it.
